channel.title: vault on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in vault on Morgoth

item.title: Vault
item.description: Vault https://github.com/hashicorp/vault CLI server: 1 2 // 启动vault $ vault server -config=/etc/vault/config.hcl init: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 // init生成keys和token. $ vault operator init // 通过keys unseal $ vault operator unseal // 通过token seal
